head.name: Crown of the Invoker
head.flavorText: "Evil continued to test my defenses. Soon after entering the swamplands, I was caught in an unnatural fog. As I lost sight of the path, I spotted a being in the distance crowned in thorns. I was not alone." -- Olenna's journal

primary: +250 Strength (Caldesann's Despair Rank 50)

attributes: Reduces cooldown of all skills by 12.5%.

set.name: Thorns of the Invoker
set.description:
Thorns of the Invoker    Burden of the Invoker (Shoulders)    Renewal of the Invoker (Legs)    Zeal of the Invoker (Feet)    Shackles of the Invoker (Wrists)    Pride of the Invoker (Hands)    Crown of the Invoker (Head)(2) Set:     
 Your Thorns damage now hits all enemies in a 15 yard radius around you. Each time you hit an enemy with Punish, Slash, or block an attack your Thorns is increased by 140% for 2 seconds. (Crusader Only)(4) Set:     
 You take 50% less damage for 20 seconds after damaging an enemy with Bombardment. (Crusader Only)(6) Set:     
 The attack speed of Punish and Slash are increased by 50% and deal 5400% of your Thorns damage to the first enemy hit. (Crusader Only)
set.descriptionHtml:
Thorns of the Invoker
Burden of the Invoker (Shoulders)
Renewal of the Invoker (Legs)
Zeal of the Invoker (Feet)
Shackles of the Invoker (Wrists)
Pride of the Invoker (Hands)
Crown of the Invoker (Head)
(2) Set:
Your Thorns damage now hits all enemies in a 15 yard radius around you. Each time you hit an enemy with Punish, Slash, or block an attack your Thorns is increased by 140% for 2 seconds. (Crusader Only)
(4) Set:
You take 50% less damage for 20 seconds after damaging an enemy with Bombardment. (Crusader Only)
(6) Set:
The attack speed of Punish and Slash are increased by 50% and deal 5400% of your Thorns damage to the first enemy hit. (Crusader Only)

secondary: Health Globes and Potions Grant +21,672 Life.

primary: Reduces all resource costs by 5.0%.
secondary: Health Globes and Potions Grant +21,672 Life.

attributes:
Bane of the Trapped - Rank 85

 Increase damage against enemies under the effects of control-impairing effects by 40.50%.

 Gain an aura that reduces the movement speed of enemies within 15 yards by 30%.

set.name: Endless Walk
set.description:
Endless Walk    The Compass Rose (Finger)    The Traveler's Pledge (Neck)(2) Set:     
 While moving, damage taken is reduced by up to 50%.    
 While standing still, damage dealt is increased by up to 100%.
set.descriptionHtml:

The Traveler's Pledge (Neck)
(2) Set:
While moving, damage taken is reduced by up to 50%.
While standing still, damage dealt is increased by up to 100%.

torso.name: Aquila Cuirass
torso.flavorText: Ceremonial armor commemorating the chieftain Ghaold's victory over the wild men from the east.

secondary: While above 90% primary resource, all damage taken is reduced by 50%.

primary: +127 Resistance to All Elements
secondary: While above 90% primary resource, all damage taken is reduced by 50%.

shoulders.name: Burden of the Invoker
shoulders.flavorText: "My trial grew more harrowing with each passing day. The thorned figure continued to ambush from the mist, armor adorned with monstrous, heavy barbs that retaliated against my attacks and threatened to impale me." -- Olenna's journal

primary: Chance to Deal 20% Area Damage on Hit.
Reduces cooldown of all skills by 8.0%.

legs.name: Renewal of the Invoker
legs.flavorText: "The mists began to clear as the healing rituals mended the lost acolyte's mind and body. She wished her armor destroyed but it was all she had to survive the wilds. If it could also be purified, it would still be of use." -- Olenna's journal

secondary: Increases Gold and Health Pickup by 1 Yards.

waist.name: Belt of the Trove
waist.flavorText: Rumors have persisted for centuries that the crusaders maintain a secret bunker in Kehjistan, filled with ancient relics of unbelievable power. When the need is great, Crusaders are allowed to borrow one of these relics. The existence of this crusader belt would seem to confirm the existence of this bunker.

secondary: Reduces damage from melee attacks by 6.0%
Every 8 seconds, call down Bombardment on a random nearby enemy. (Crusader Only)

primary: +112 Resistance to All Elements
secondary: Reduces damage from melee attacks by 6.0%
Every 8 seconds, call down Bombardment on a random nearby enemy. (Crusader Only)

hands.name: Pride of the Invoker
hands.flavorText: "My opponent’s hands were fast. She quickly cast aside my shield and plunged her dagger toward my heart. As my armor broke her blade, her surprised look was just the opening I needed." -- Olenna's journal

primary: Reduces cooldown of all skills by 8.0%.

bracers.name: Shackles of the Invoker
bracers.flavorText: "I discovered my enemy was just a young Vizjerei apprentice, no older than twelve. Defeated, her armor began to turn against her. Cursed thorns dug deep into her arms and drew blood. I had to act quickly." -- Olenna's journal

primary: Physical skills deal 18% more damage.
+129 Resistance to All Elements
secondary: +33% Extra Gold from Monsters

feet.name: Zeal of the Invoker
feet.flavorText: "Her thorned armor having been purified in the Light, my apprentice's new faith grew with each step. The feet that wandered lost in the mist now march with fervor as we leave these swamplands at long last and head north." -- Olenna's journal

rightFinger.name: Justice Lantern
rightFinger.flavorText: Once worn by the self-appointed guardians of Sanctuary, who were said to feel no fear.

offHand.name: Akarat's Awakening
offHand.flavorText: "And Yaerius appeared unto Akarat and showed him the Light that illuminates all souls with its blessed power. So long as we trust in this sacred force, we shall have strength everlasting and falter not in our trials." —Excerpt from a mystic’s account of the life of Akarat
